sentences.sentence: "Today's young people are quite calculating," says Chieko Akiyama, a social commentator.

sentences.sentence: As that great commentator on human affairs, Dr. Samuel Johnson, once remarked, "Men have been wise in very different modes; but they have always laughed in the same way."
sentences.translation: 正如人类事务的伟大评论家塞缪尔·约翰逊博士曾经说过的那样：“人类智慧的展现方式各不相同,但笑的方式是相同的。”
